element.label: AdverseReactionRiskItem
element.definition: Risk of harmful or undesirable physiological response which is unique to the individual and associated with exposure to a known substance.

element.label: SubstanceName
element.definition: Identification of a substance, or substance class, which is considered to put the individual at risk of an adverse reaction event.

element.label: Criticality
element.definition: Estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, from a future exposure to the identified substance.

element.label: VerificationStatus
element.definition: Assertion about certainty associated about the potential risk of a reaction to the identified substance.

element.label: ReactionEvent
element.definition: Details about each adverse reaction event linked to exposure to the identified 'Substance'.

element.label: Manifestation
element.definition: Clinical symptom and/or sign that were observed or associated with the adverse reaction.

element.label: Comment
element.definition: Additional narrative about the adverse reaction risk not captured in other fields.

element.label: LastUpdated
element.definition: The date this adverse reaction summary was last updated.

element.label: AdverseReactionRiskExclusionItemR1
element.short: Adverse reaction risk exclusion item R1
element.definition: A positive statement about no known adverse reactions, accurate only at the time of recording.

element.label: AdverseReactionRiskExclusionStatement
element.definition: Positive statement that there are no known adverse reactions for inclusion.

element.label: AdverseReactionRiskAbsenceItemR1
element.short: Adverse reaction risk absence item R1
element.definition: A positive statement of absence of information about known adverse reaction risks, accurate only at the time of recording.

element.label: AdverseReactionRiskAbsenceStatement
element.definition: Positive statement that no information is available about adverse reaction risks.
